title: Game crashes after champ select
body: Hello ladies and gentleman, I know this is a common problem in league after a new patch that games crashes after champ select. A table pops up saying "unable to connect". Tried disabling my firewall, antivirus, flushed my dns, dang even downloaded hextech repair tool. Nothing helped, dont know what to do next. Btw sometimes games starts and everything okay, but most of the times table pops up.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having problems and failing to transition to the game server after champion select.  You've taken some solid steps so far, all of which could be blocking factors.  Make sure to go over the additional steps as well in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities.  Test it in a custom and let me know how it goes.

Did everything, nothing helped. Also contacted player support, send my logs to him, he suggested to delete my hamatchi, it didnt help aswell. Now 2 days without his reply trying to fix it by myself, looking through forums and etc., no luck so far.
The specialist may ask for some additional steps to help rule out possibilities.  Continue corresponding with them, and they'll be happy to assist.  Good luck!
